page.title: 16THE POLICING OF CORSHAM
page.content: The Corsham area is about 36,000 acres. The population of this area is 21,500. The police personnel in the Corsham area consists of 1 Inspector, 3 Sergeants, 19 Constables including 1 woman Constable and 2 Detective Constables. Police transport consists of 2 cars,2 vans and 2 bicycles. 1003 crimes were committed in 1984. The most common crimes was burglary (146). The next most common was general stealing (133). These were followed by stealing from vehicles (122) and criminal damage (106). Woundings and assault was the least common crime (54).There were no murders. The police in Corsham don't carry guns but if they need them they call in the Fire Arms Squad. The police in Corsham spend a lot of their time dealing with road accidents,of which 2 were fatal.
